oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: |xue, both his wives and his child inflict various forms of violence on each other. In the course of the story |xue becomes a number of people all at once to beat his wives and child. When he has died, |xue's father makes a grave for |xue. |xue's father and father
law put |xue into the grave. |xue cries out for them to leave him alone. |xue's father
law burns his eyes with fire and his mother beats |xue's father
law with a stick. The father

law shoots |xue's father with an arrow, killing him. |xue lies on the ground crying for his dead father. At sunset |xue's father returns to life and pursues |xue to beat him. |xue's father ties him up in a skin and carries him home. |xue's mother tries to give |xue food but his father says she must not. |xue lies silently on the ground and then shoots his father. |xue, his father and his mother continue to beat each other up. |xue goes into a mouse
hole and bites his father, breaking his 'first fore
finger'. |xue's father beats |xue as he runs into the mouse
hole, breaking off a horn that he has tied to his back. [This story should have been continued elsewhere, but appears not to have been.]
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: |xue and his parents and child
